title: Iterative Research-Based Process for Experiential Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing experiential learning for real-life problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can design experiential learning environments by applying the three core elements (Authenticity, Reflection, Collaboration) of the mARC model to actual projects
Learners enhance their knowledge re-contextualisation ability to connect theory with practical experience through iterative design processes
Learners can perform reflection-based learning processes by sharing feedback with peers using collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
